DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate immunogenicity safety Quinvaxem vaccine ( liquid combination vaccine diphtheria , tetanus , B. pertussis , hepatitis B H. influenzae Type B ) . Healthy Vietnamese infant receive three dos vaccine 2 , 3 4 month age accord local Expanded Programme Immunisation ( EPI ) schedule
DOC.brief_title: Study Quinvaxem Vaccination Against Diphtheria , Pertussis , Tetanus , Hepatitis B Diseases Caused Haemophilus Influenzae Type B
DOC.criteria: Infants age DTP vaccination local EPI program ( 60120 day old ) free obvious health problem Have normal gestational age ( â‰¥ 37 week ) ; birth weight > 2.5 kg There congenital disease detect interview clinical examination Already yet receive Hepatitis B vaccination birth Do dermatological disease eczema , allergy Parent legal guardian voluntarily provide consent child participation study signing inform consent agree comply study procedure Already vaccinate DTP vaccine Have acute infection time study vaccination Contraindications Quinvaxem Receiving treatment systemic corticosteroid Currently participate another clinical trial In receipt parenteral immunoglobulin preparation and/or blood/blood product since birth Parents intend move another location study ( next 12 month )
